title: Ethics & Accounting
description: The course is designed to expose students to issues surrounding accountants' professional ethics.  Credit not allowed for both MGT 4047 and MGT 6047.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ACCT 2101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ACCT 2102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
